phais-plus.title: Phais+
description: Pharmaceutical system that manages the exchange of medications between hospitals through requests/tickets.
Its goal is to help hospitals reduce the waste of medications, as they are often discarded due to expiration and other factors.
Design made from scratch, figma for prototipying and TailwindCSS for css. Development made with React.js, Node.js and PostgreSQL.

bbcs.title: Bring Back Coffee
description: E-commerce for a Vintage Cafeteria, you can log in and put the items of your choice in your cart!

Project from my final year in high school integrated with technical informatics, in 2021. It was two intense weeks of learning, during which I dealt with new errors, studied different documentation, searched for references, and corrected errors. I also implemented browser sessions, learned to use external libraries, and deepened my knowledge about the Python/Flask ecosystem and MVC architecture.
Development done in Python using the Flask framework and SQLite database, with styling in Bootstrap.

jpd.title: JPD Landing Page
description: Landing Page for the promotion of the NGO Jovens pela Diferença (Youth for Difference). Multiple information about the association in one place.

It features sections dedicated to introducing the NGO’s mission, values, methodologies, and team. It also showcases the NGO’s significant accomplishments, such as the number of volunteers and years of operation. Additionally, it presents potential partnership plans, introduces the management team, promotes their networks, and provides a swift means for contact.

The application was developed in a span of two days, utilizing a combination of reference research and the implementation of accessible and responsive templates, tailored to meet its specific requirements.

The front-end development was executed using React.js. The styling was accomplished with the TailwindCSS framework, supplemented by components from HyperUI and MambaUI. The deployment plataform utilized was Vercel.

elderCare.title: Elder Care
description: A mobile app developed to assist people who are caring for the elderly.

The app provides a set of features, including: to-do list for each day of the week, customizable list of general care instructions, nutrition section to record dietary preferences and restrictions, medication listing to keep track of medications, including their maximum daily dosage.
Medications are available to be added to the daily list, with the flexibility to adjust their schedules and dosages.
Prototyping was done using Figma, and development was carried out using React Native and Firebase.

desafioFuturo.title: Globo Esporte Desafio do Futuro
description: The winning application from the latest episode of the Desafio do Futuro (Future Challenge), a program on Globo Esporte, aired on a specific date.
The challenge involved designing and implementing the front-end for an application that lists Globo Esporte videos. Each video was required to have an information section and a questionnaire section.
The dynamic involved working with presenters to complete the challenge and defend the application.
Prototyping was done using Figma, and development was carried out in React.js.

adapterPlan.title: Adapter Plan
description: Weekly planner with a simple and intuitive interface, featuring pastel colors and an absence of hours to convey tranquility.
Login system and task CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete).
Developed in a group during the informatics technical course in 2019.
Prototyping done using Figma and development in PHP, MySql, and pure CSS.
